segments.text: How's it going?  How are you feeling?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It just feels like I was talking to him yesterday.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You guys were real close huh?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: He was my only friend growing up.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: no one else would talk to me but he would.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: He was supposed to be the best man at my wedding.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You know I was always the one to tell him to be more wild you know?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And he just took it overboard.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You know a stupid case of drunk driving it's just...
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and the worst part of it is that he was in the car with his girlfriend,
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And the car that he hit was his family.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and the kids are paralyzed in a coma right now.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and just going to the funeral it's-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: -do I miss him or do I hate him, you know?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah.  Like I mean if you need anyone to talk to or anything I'm here for you okay?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I was supposed to see him last summer
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: then I got busy with work and stuff and three years go by
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and then something like this happens you know?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I mean I haven't even talked to him on the phone for the past three months.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: He's supposed to be my best friend.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: just things happen in life and you just...there's just no explanation you know?  We just don't...
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: He was studying to be a doctor.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I mean he was...he wanted to help people in poor countries, that is his goal.  He didn't care about the money.  He just wanted to go and help people.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: He actually wanted to do something.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well now you can follow his footsteps, you know?  Carry out what he wanted to do.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: He is the greatest...everyone liked him.
segments.speaker: M
